misalignments.reasoning: Spec requires 'POST /api/auth/register' endpoint, but code implements it as 'POST /api/auth/signup' at src/app/api/auth/signup/route.ts
Spec requires 'Checkbox (left) to toggle completion' for task items, but code uses a Button component with symbols ('✓' and '○') instead of the Checkbox UI component
Spec requires '"Add Task" button' for task creation, but code displays 'Create' as the button text
Spec defines MISSING_FIELDS error code for required fields missing, but login endpoint uses MISSING_CREDENTIALS instead
Spec requires error response format with code and message properties, but frontend pages display data.error object directly (showing '[object Object]' instead of the message text)
